2021 SYDNEY OPEN
While competing on the final day of action of the 2021 Sydney Open, 22-year-old Zac Stubblety-Cook put up the swim of his life in the men’s 200m breaststroke.
Topping the field by … [+1738 chars]

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Leicester City wins its first FA Cup trophy, beating Chelsea 1-0 thanks to Youri Tielemans' stunning strike - ABC News
articles.description: A magnificent long-range strike from Youri Tielemans gives Leicester City their first FA Cup triumph with a 1-0 victory over Chelsea at Wembley, in front of the biggest crowd in England since March 2020.
articles.content: A magnificent long-range strike from Youri Tielemans gave Leicester City their first FA Cup triumph with a 1-0 victory over Chelsea at Wembley on Saturday, in front of the biggest crowd in England si… [+3963 chars]
